amendment.description: To exclude service academy permanent and career professors from a limitation on strengths applicable to active duty officers in grades of majors, lieutenant colonel, and colonel and Navy grades of lieutenant commander, and captain.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3229 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3229 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator McCain. (consideration: CR S6715-6716; text: CR S6715) To exclude service academy permanent and career professors from a limitation on strengths applicable to active duty officers in grades of majors, lieutenant colonel, and colonel and Navy grades of lieutenant commander, and captain.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3229 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3229 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator McCain.
